item.description:
Jasper White's Summer Shack

Inspired by a traditional New England clam shack, Jasper White's Summer Shack offers an array of local and regional favorites. From fresh raw bar, locally caught fish, Jasper's famous pan-roasted lobster, tender steaks, and the Shack's surf & turf, to fried seafood baskets, burgers, lobster rolls, and housemade desserts, there's something for everyone....lunch at 1 pm...car-pool back at 5 (if car-pool)....go shopping,gamble a little....whatever you desire to 5...come and enjoy..(.chuck will car-pool...room for 2 more)...we all will meet at the restaurant at 1pm

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: a relaxing casino lunch excursion mohegan sun july23 1pm-5pm
